titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the second Sunday in Mychaelmas tearme last. 1590. By Geruase Babington D. of Diuinitie. Not printed before this 23. of August. 1591
titleStmt.author: Babington, Gervase, 1550-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Este, dwelling in Aldersgate streete at the signe of the Black Horse, and are there to be sould,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached by D. Babington, at Paules crosse.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Aldersgate streete at the signe of the Black Horse
